incident.title: MySQL K8s Pod Created
incident.description: MySQL K8s Pod Created

resolution.resolution_summary:
MySQL Deployment was out of Memory. 

Resolved by increasing memory and restarting mysql pod: 
oc delete pod -n robot-shop $(oc get po -n robot-shop|grep mysql|awk '{print$1

incident.title: Customer didn't receive eFax
incident.description: I tried sending a fax to a customer through the eFax online portal and also via email. My customer did not receive the fax in both instances. I don't know if this is an issue on our side with transmission or on my customer's side.
